remarks: ` On ` consists of all sets that contain all its transitive proper subsets.  This definition comes from J. R. Isbell, "A Definition of Ordinal Numbers," American Mathematical Monthly, vol 67 (1960), pp. 51-52.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 20-Feb-2011.)
statement:
dfon2 $p |- On = { x | A. y ( ( y C. x /\ Tr y ) -> y e. x ) } $.
$d x y $.
